params._token0: token to be converted to sdex
params._token1: token to be converted to sdex

params._amount0Delta: amount of token0 for the swap (negative is incoming, positive is required to pay to pair)
params._amount1Delta: amount of token1 for the swap (negative is incoming, positive is required to pay to pair)
params._data: for Router path and payer for the swap (see router for details)

executeWork(address,address).notice: public function for executing swaps on tokens and send them to staking contract will be called from a Smardex Pair on mint and burn, and can be forced call by anyone

transferTokens().notice: transfer SDEX from here to staking contract

userdoc.notice: AutoSwapper makes it automatic and/or public to get fees from Smardex and convert it to tokens for staking
